Room.Name: Leviathan Drive/Hillcrest Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Hillcrest Drive and Leviathan Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Hillcrest Drive, running east to west, intersects Leviathan Drive, running north and south. Hillcrest Drive is one of the longer roads in town, running from the east city walls to the west city walls without being detoured or interrupted. Similarly, Leviathan Drive spans the city from north to south city walls.
